outcome: Halden’s death is uncovered as an intentional, sacrificial act: his declining health and disillusionment led him to embed a revealing code into the BCI. This self-triggered his demise and started an information cascade exposing hidden truths about the Council.

events.description: An encrypted packet is discovered in the BCI, authenticated with Halden’s unique keys. Its embedded message details Halden’s failing health and his deliberate plans to die, framing it as a final correction for the system.
Media leaks begin to detail Halden’s private communications—letters to Council members that warn of the BCI’s dangers and his hope for a reckoning after his departure.
A chain reaction is triggered by the released code: it starts exposing compromised files and hidden BCI decisions, implicating prominent Council officials in systemic abuses.

Large demonstrations break out across Stenograd, demanding justice for the harms caused by the BCI and a full restructure of the governing Council. Council leaders issue panicked assurances and promises of reform.
